AD_NetherbrainIntDevAmbushMid.synopsis: The players are in combat with a  large group of intellect devourers, then a second wave of them appear. The Netherbrain taunts the player.
AD_NetherbrainIntDevAmbushMid.how_to_trigger: Load END_MainProgress till triggering the ambush

SWD_DeadSmuggler.synopsis:
The Morphic Pool, now occupied by the Netherbrain, was a smugglers run used to transport illegal goods under Baldur's Gate.

Three men arrived one day to negotiate the transport of a large amount of weapons and cargo but the talks never got anywhere, but they were not interested in any business dealings and were merely scouting the location for the Elderbrain.

Shortly after the Elderbrain made it's way into cave through the river channels. Everyone present became thralls, picking away at stone to make room for the growing brain, the water slowly turning into brine
and any thrall that outlived their usefulness became hosts to Intellect Devourers.

With some quick thinking and a lot of luck, this smuggler stayed hidden for as long as she could in hopes she could make contact and escape with her sibling, who also worked as a smuggler but was unfortunate enough to be at the other end of the cave when the Elderbrain arrived. Eventually her luck ran out as the number of Intellect Devourers grew and found her location. She fought valiantly, but they proved to be too much as she fell without ever finding her sister.
SWD_DeadSmuggler.how_to_trigger: Cast Speak with Dead on S_END_DeadSmuggler

NetherIllusionLaezel.synopsis: With the players being so close to the Netherbrain, they start to see things that shouldn't exist around them. The Netherbrain attempts to get under the skin of the player characters, digging into their weaknesses, failures, and insecurities.

AD_Netherbrain.synopsis: The Netherbrain is expositing it's grand design as the player becomes closer to it.

GortashFinalStone.synopsis: The player has turned on Gortash moments before confronting the Netherbrain. After picking up the item from his body, they combine in fantastical fasion into a floating crown above the players head. They are now ready to face the Netherbrain.

EmperorAD_Arrival.synopsis: The player has just arrived to the Morphic Pool. It's quite a spooky place and the last stretch to the Netherbrain.

Gortash.synopsis: The player has made a deal with Gortash. He is waiting for the player in the Morphic Pool near the Netherbrain, ready to confront it using the Netherstones.

PAD_MorphicBanter.synopsis: The players are reaching the final stretch to the first encoutner of the Netherbrain.

GortashAttacked.synopsis: The player attacked Gortash while they are near the Netherbrain in the Morphic Pool. He thinks they're an idiot and will throw down.
GortashAttacked.how_to_trigger: Goto Morphic PoolTravel till you see Gortash just on the other side of the doorAttack him

BoatPassage.synopsis: The party take the boat to Morphic Pool, where they will encounter the Netherbrain.
BoatPassage.how_to_trigger: Click on the boat in the LOW SewersAccept the ready check

NetherIllusionHalsin.synopsis: With the players being so close to the Netherbrain, they start to see things that shouldn't exist around them. The Netherbrain attempts to get under the skin of the player characters, digging into their weaknesses, failures, and insecurities.

AD_GortashCallout.synopsis: Gortash calls out to the player to talk about their approach to the Netherbrain. If the player just runs past him towards the Netherbrain, he get's a bit salty.

EmperorAD_Observations.synopsis: The players just finished combat against the intellect devourers. The Emperor makes observations about the environment and how it's being twisted by the Netherbrain.

NetherbrainConfrontation.synopsis: The player has reached the end of the Morphic Pool and has encountered the Netherbrain. It pulls the players into it's mind palace, leading to the player attempting to use the Karsus' Compulsion spell. It fails, leading to the Emperor saving them by opening a portal to the astral prism.
NetherbrainConfrontation.how_to_trigger: Enter END_MainProceed through to the end of the Morphic Pool (use Teleport to Netherbrain debug cube or go to 783; -12; 1634)Will auto trigger

PAD_MissingStone.synopsis: A player has walked to the end of Morphic Pool after killing Gortash without grabbing his stone.
PAD_MissingStone.how_to_trigger: Load END_MainGo to Gortash 859; -49; -23Kill himDo not loot him and walk towards the Netherbrain 783; -12; 1634

NetherIllusionAstarion.synopsis: With the players being so close to the Netherbrain, they start to see things that shouldn't exist around them. The Netherbrain attempts to get under the skin of the player characters, digging into their weaknesses, failures, and insecurities.

Arrival.synopsis: The player has just arrived at the morphic pool. They enter with a crash, then dead silent. The Netherbrain makes contact with them, terrorises them, then leave them alone in the dark. They are in dangerous territory.

PAD_DeadSmugglerResolve.synopsis: The player placed a token item that was found on the Dead Smuggler and placed it into the inventory of the Dead Smuggler Sibling. They may have died apart, but mayber their souls will find peace together
PAD_DeadSmugglerResolve.how_to_trigger: Take the Teddy Bear item from the Dead Smuggler and place it into the inventory of the Dead Smuggler Sibling

NetherIllusionGale.synopsis: With the players being so close to the Netherbrain, they start to see things that shouldn't exist around them. The Netherbrain attempts to get under the skin of the player characters, digging into their weaknesses, failures, and insecurities.

PAD_PsionicallySupressed.synopsis: The players are under the Psionic Suppresion of the Netherbrain as they get closer to it. The players must press on to eventually trigger the dialog with Netherbrain, starting the Mind Arena battle.
PAD_PsionicallySupressed.how_to_trigger: Enter END_MainTeleport To 808; -6; 1633Walk down the 'ramp' towards the brine pool

PAD_BrainquakeStunned.synopsis: The player has entered the Morphic Pool and just got stunned by the brainquak from the Netherbrain.
PAD_BrainquakeStunned.how_to_trigger: Load END_MainNaturally progress till a brainquake is triggered

NetherIllusionWyll.synopsis: With the players being so close to the Netherbrain, they start to see things that shouldn't exist around them. The Netherbrain attempts to get under the skin of the player characters, digging into their weaknesses, failures, and insecurities.

AD_NetherbrainIntDevAmbushStart.synopsis: The players have just been ambushed by a large group of intellect devourers. The Netherbrain taunts the player.
AD_NetherbrainIntDevAmbushStart.how_to_trigger: Load END_MainProgress till triggering the ambush

NetherIllusionShadowheart.synopsis: With the players being so close to the Netherbrain, they start to see things that shouldn't exist around them. The Netherbrain attempts to get under the skin of the player characters, digging into their weaknesses, failures, and insecurities.

SWD_DeadSmuggler_27.speaker: Narrator
SWD_DeadSmuggler_27.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

SWD_DeadSmuggler_8.speaker: Player
SWD_DeadSmuggler_8.text: What do you know about the brain?

SWD_DeadSmuggler_7.speaker: Listelia Dryselis
SWD_DeadSmuggler_7.text: Heard... screams... other side... of cave...

SWD_DeadSmuggler_25.speaker: Player
SWD_DeadSmuggler_25.text: How do I recognise your sister if I find her?

SWD_DeadSmuggler_32.speaker: Narrator
SWD_DeadSmuggler_32.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

SWD_DeadSmuggler_38.speaker: Narrator
SWD_DeadSmuggler_38.text: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

NetherIllusionLaezel_7.speaker: 7accd120-7410-4df3-9b3a-eafd0474c892
NetherIllusionLaezel_7.text: |I try and try. Nothing. I failed everyone, to be casted out.|

NetherIllusionLaezel_0.speaker: Lae'zel
NetherIllusionLaezel_0.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionLaezel_1.speaker: 7accd120-7410-4df3-9b3a-eafd0474c892
NetherIllusionLaezel_1.text: |I should just succumb to this tadpole. I am worthless.|

NetherIllusionLaezel_9.speaker: Jaheira
NetherIllusionLaezel_9.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionLaezel_12.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
NetherIllusionLaezel_12.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionLaezel_2.speaker: Karlach
NetherIllusionLaezel_2.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionLaezel_5.speaker: Wyll
NetherIllusionLaezel_5.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionLaezel_4.speaker: Shadowheart
NetherIllusionLaezel_4.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionLaezel_8.speaker: Gale
NetherIllusionLaezel_8.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionLaezel_3.speaker: Astarion
NetherIllusionLaezel_3.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionLaezel_10.speaker: Minsc
NetherIllusionLaezel_10.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionLaezel_15.speaker: Halsin
NetherIllusionLaezel_15.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

GortashFinalStone_6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player crouches to pick up Gortash's netherstone.

GortashFinalStone_4.speaker: Lae'zel
GortashFinalStone_4.text: All three stones are in hand. Finally, the elder brain will fall.

GortashFinalStone_8.speaker: Shadowheart
GortashFinalStone_8.text: All three stones. These should allow us to dominate that brain.

GortashFinalStone_10.speaker: Astarion
GortashFinalStone_10.text: And that's the full set - everything we need to face this brain.

GortashFinalStone_5.speaker: Wyll
GortashFinalStone_5.text: That's all three Netherstones. We have what we need to eliminate the brain and end the Absolute.

GortashFinalStone_9.speaker: Gale
GortashFinalStone_9.text: |All three stones - we have what we need to dominate the elder brain.|

GortashFinalStone_3.speaker: Karlach
GortashFinalStone_3.text: |All three stones - we have what we need to dominate the elder brain.|

GortashFinalStone_12.speaker: Halsin
GortashFinalStone_12.text: |All three stones - we have what we need to dominate the elder brain.|

GortashFinalStone_0.speaker: Jaheira
GortashFinalStone_0.text: |All three stones - we have what we need to dominate the elder brain.|

GortashFinalStone_13.speaker: The Emperor
GortashFinalStone_13.text: Your trust in Gortash was questionable, but I'm glad you understood what we needed. Now - we must confront the brain.
GortashFinalStone_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player pockets the stone / puts it away.

GortashFinalStone_11.speaker: Minsc
GortashFinalStone_11.text: |All three stones - we have what we need to dominate the elder brain.|

GortashFinalStone_1.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
GortashFinalStone_1.text: |All three stones - we have what we need to dominate the elder brain.|

EmperorAD_Arrival_0.text: Can you smell it? The brine... it's infused with magic. The brain is here.

Gortash_4.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Gortash_4.text: The brain is about to break free. We have no time to lose. We either shackle it by the force of our will, and usher in a new age, or the city breaks.
Gortash_4.context: NodeContext: high intensity - this is the moment before an apocalyptic final battle. He's confident in his abilities, but this is uncharted territory

Gortash_3.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Gortash_3.text: You have survived shadows, defied gods, and overcome many challenges to be here. But that doesn't mean you're ready for what comes next.
Gortash_3.context: NodeContext: high intensity - this is the moment before an apocalyptic final battle. He's confident in his abilities, but this is uncharted territory

Gortash_13.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Gortash_13.text: For that you will have to be much, much stronger.

Gortash_6.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Gortash_6.text: I don't doubt your conviction, but I'd be a fool to expect victory.
Gortash_6.context: NodeContext: high intensity and chiding - this is the moment before an apocalyptic final battle. He's confident in his abilities, but this is uncharted territory

Gortash_7.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Gortash_7.text: The brain has grown incredibly powerful. Confronting it is madness, but there's no other way.
Gortash_7.context: NodeContext: high intensity - this is the moment before an apocalyptic final battle. He's confident in his abilities, but this is uncharted territory

Gortash_9.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Gortash_9.text: If either of us falters, both of us die. Come - let's end this.
Gortash_9.context: NodeContext: high intensity - this is the moment before an apocalyptic final battle. He's confident in his abilities, but this is uncharted territory

Gortash_12.speaker: Player
Gortash_12.text: I've endured more than you know - I'm ready.

Gortash_10.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Gortash_10.context: NodeContext: doubtful - this is the moment before an apocalyptic final battle. He's confident in his abilities, but this is uncharted territory

Gortash_0.speaker: Player
Gortash_0.text: Maybe we should turn back while we still can.

Gortash_1.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Gortash_1.text: You're right to be afraid - but there's no room for cowardice or complacency.
Gortash_1.context: NodeContext: high intensity - this is the moment before an apocalyptic final battle. He's confident in his abilities, but this is uncharted territory

Gortash_5.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
Gortash_5.text: I won't let you ruin this - not when I'm so close!

GortashAttacked_2.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
GortashAttacked_2.context: NodeContext: furious, he's just been attacked by somebody he thought was an ally, right as they're on the verge of an apocalyptic fight

GortashAttacked_3.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
GortashAttacked_3.text: We are on the cusp of confronting an entity beyond comprehension - we need to work together.
GortashAttacked_3.context: NodeContext: intense,  he's just been attacked by somebody he thought was an ally, right as they're on the verge of an apocalyptic fight

GortashAttacked_10.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
GortashAttacked_10.text: What a coincidence, so did my foot.
GortashAttacked_10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Before the line Gortash gives the player a kick in the shin. Player has an ouch reaction. NodeContext: quipping having just kicked somebody

GortashAttacked_6.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
GortashAttacked_6.text: Don't do that again, hm? Or the next slip will be fatal.

GortashAttacked_5.speaker: Player
GortashAttacked_5.text: I don't trust you one bit.

GortashAttacked_4.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
GortashAttacked_4.text: Trust me to help you survive this, and I will grant you the same courtesy. If we live, we can settle our differences later.
GortashAttacked_4.context: NodeContext: running out of patience, imploring. The emphasised 'if' leading into the second sentence is an expression of doubt

GortashAttacked_8.speaker: Player
GortashAttacked_8.text: There's no we - I will confront the brain alone. With all three stones in my possession.

GortashAttacked_1.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
GortashAttacked_1.context: NodeContext: smarmy but a little ruffled

GortashAttacked_0.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
GortashAttacked_0.text: You could have ruled by my side - now you'll be dust beneath my boot.
GortashAttacked_0.context: NodeContext: confident and a little disappointed

GortashAttacked_7.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
GortashAttacked_7.context: NodeContext: First word shouted, aggressive, then a simple statement of intent - he's confident he's going to kill the person he's addressing

Us_3.speaker: Us
Us_3.text: |You are to meet. Demanded! You will see the Grand Design. Beautiful.|

Us_2.speaker: Us
Us_2.text: |But you still are not one of us yet. Why? Soon, together!|

Us_8.speaker: Player
Us_8.text: |You should have died in the crash.|

Us_7.speaker: Us
Us_7.text: |Life, death, all part of the design. Come join us. Friend!|

Us_1.speaker: Us
Us_1.text: |Yes! But it needs to speak to you. Then you'll see!|

BoatPassage_1.speaker: Narrator
BoatPassage_1.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [party board; disembark]

Party steps into the skiff on the water. 
Boat departs from riverbank and sinks into the darkness as it goes down-river.

BoatPassage_0.speaker: Narrator
BoatPassage_0.text: *Silence but for the gentle, rhythmic slap of water on rock as your vessel cuts through.*
BoatPassage_0.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Boat moves through water]

The boat moves off into darkness

NetherIllusionHalsin_8.speaker: Lae'zel
NetherIllusionHalsin_8.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionHalsin_1.speaker: Jaheira
NetherIllusionHalsin_1.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionHalsin_13.speaker: f0962778-131c-4b07-b020-1d2f08463b2d
NetherIllusionHalsin_13.text: |There's no point to any of this. Let is all burn, burn, burn, burn...|

NetherIllusionHalsin_14.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
NetherIllusionHalsin_14.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionHalsin_10.speaker: Karlach
NetherIllusionHalsin_10.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionHalsin_9.speaker: Wyll
NetherIllusionHalsin_9.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionHalsin_6.speaker: Shadowheart
NetherIllusionHalsin_6.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionHalsin_3.speaker: Gale
NetherIllusionHalsin_3.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionHalsin_4.speaker: Astarion
NetherIllusionHalsin_4.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionHalsin_12.speaker: Minsc
NetherIllusionHalsin_12.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionHalsin_16.speaker: Halsin
NetherIllusionHalsin_16.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

AD_GortashCallout_0.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
AD_GortashCallout_0.text: Without my Netherstone, you don't stand a chance. Come here.

AD_GortashCallout_1.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
AD_GortashCallout_1.text: This way. Quickly. We need to talk.

EmperorAD_Observations_0.text: These creatures were not themselves. Corruption is in the air - it infects everything it touches.

NetherbrainConfrontation_40.speaker: Narrator
NetherbrainConfrontation_40.text: *Deathly silence, the air stale and putrid.*

NetherbrainConfrontation_65.speaker: The Emperor
NetherbrainConfrontation_65.text: It's close. Have the stones ready.
NetherbrainConfrontation_65.context: NodeContext: voice in head, telepathic, Emperor not physically present

NetherbrainConfrontation_61.speaker: Narrator
NetherbrainConfrontation_61.text: *Your blood slows, your senses strung so tight they could snap in an instant.*
NetherbrainConfrontation_61.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Morphic Pool: Nervous anticipation]

Party looks at each other in nervous anticipation, not sure what's about to happen.

NetherbrainConfrontation_34.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Netherstones rise from about the player's person, combine in mid-air, and drift back into the player's grasp.

NetherbrainConfrontation_44.speaker: Elder Brain
NetherbrainConfrontation_44.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Morphic Pool: Netherbrain emerges] 

Bubbles on the surface of the morphic pool.
The Netherbrain rises.
Player reacts with horror, and pockets the combined Netherstone.

NetherbrainConfrontation_150.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
NetherbrainConfrontation_150.text: By the Dark Lord - how did it grow so large?

NetherbrainConfrontation_54.context: CinematicNodeContext: The world fades into the black winds shown in GOB_Orpheus_VoiceofAbsolute. The player small and insignificant in the full presence of the brain and it's direct attention.

NetherbrainConfrontation_80.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_80.text: You think you know why you are here.
NetherbrainConfrontation_80.context: NodeContext: SFX of brain's voice solidifying into a single speaking voice.

NetherbrainConfrontation_126.speaker: Elder Brain
NetherbrainConfrontation_126.text: You think that by enslaving me with the Netherstones, you will bring your Father's scourge upon the world.

NetherbrainConfrontation_121.speaker: Elder Brain
NetherbrainConfrontation_121.text: You think you can atone for giving me my power, child of Bhaal, by destroying me with the Netherstones.

NetherbrainConfrontation_53.speaker: Elder Brain
NetherbrainConfrontation_53.text: You think that by allying with the last of the Chosen and uniting the Netherstones, you can destroy me.

NetherbrainConfrontation_18.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_18.text: You think that by killing the Chosen and taking the Netherstones, you can destroy me.

NetherbrainConfrontation_122.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_122.context: CinematicNodeContext: A psionic shockwave bursts from the Netherbrain, and the blackwinds whipping around the player kick up.

NetherbrainConfrontation_29.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player struggles against it and only just stays on their feet.

NetherbrainConfrontation_140.speaker: The Emperor
NetherbrainConfrontation_140.text: It's messing with your mind. Don't listen to it. Use the stones.
NetherbrainConfrontation_140.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Astral Prism drifts to the center of the party, and emits it's psionic shieldNodeContext: [vo only]

NetherbrainConfrontation_141.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The player (and possibly Gortash) arrive in a vast liminal space created by the Karsus' Compulsion, it's the horrifying manifestation of the Netherbrain's mind.

The Astral Prisim floats next to the player and they give it a nod, acknowleging that they know their work has just begun.

NetherbrainConfrontation_41.speaker: Player
NetherbrainConfrontation_41.text: Muster the full might of your physical form - throw it into breaking through the brain's defences.

NetherbrainConfrontation_99.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The player holds the stone in their left hand and thrusts their right forward for the somatic componant.

A spectral form of a massive chained haproon buzzes by the player toward the face forehead of the Netherbrain.

NetherbrainConfrontation_113.context: CinematicNodeContext: The harpoon sinks deep into the moon-size manifestation of the Netherbrain.

NetherbrainConfrontation_37.context: CinematicNodeContext: The spectral harpoon deflects off a psionic barrier created by the Netherbrain and drifts limply in front of the massive visage.

NetherbrainConfrontation_87.speaker: Elder Brain
NetherbrainConfrontation_87.text: By eliminating Ketheric and Orin, you have simply unbound me.

NetherbrainConfrontation_50.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_50.text: The Crown is now mine to command - mine alone.

NetherbrainConfrontation_64.speaker: The Emperor
NetherbrainConfrontation_64.text: Don't listen to it! Focus on the Crown!

NetherbrainConfrontation_92.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player swaps the nether stone from their left hand to their right.

NetherbrainConfrontation_107.speaker: Player
NetherbrainConfrontation_107.text: Draw on the power of the Weave and try again. You will not let the Crown slip from your grasp.

NetherbrainConfrontation_36.speaker: Player
NetherbrainConfrontation_36.text: The Crown is an unmissable target - set it in your sights, and trust that you will strike true.

NetherbrainConfrontation_49.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The player  thrusts their off hand forward, in a mirrored movement of the first phase of the spell.

Another spectal harpoon whooshes by from behind.

NetherbrainConfrontation_117.context: CinematicNodeContext: The next harpoon sinks deep into the Netherbrain's cranium, not far off from the target of the first.InternalNodeContext: Can't be aliased from previous phase, each harpoon is discrete

NetherbrainConfrontation_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: This spectral harpoon deflects off a psionic barrier created by the Netherbrain and drifts limply in front of the massive visage.InternalNodeContext: Can't be aliased from previous phase, each harpoon is discrete

NetherbrainConfrontation_72.speaker: Elder Brain
NetherbrainConfrontation_72.text: You placed the Crown upon me in the depths of Moonrise Towers, and there I was born.

NetherbrainConfrontation_13.speaker: Elder Brain
NetherbrainConfrontation_13.text: Bhaal's Chosen placed the Crown upon me in the depths of Moonrise Towers, and there I was born.

NetherbrainConfrontation_47.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_47.text: The Crown is not my weakness - it is what made me what I am.

NetherbrainConfrontation_133.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
NetherbrainConfrontation_133.text: You are delusional - the Crown is how we controlled you!
NetherbrainConfrontation_133.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gortash steps in front of the player, pulling into his grasp. The waves it, unfocused, in the direction of the Netherbrain as a doddered priest might dangle a crucifix before and elder god--ineffectually.

NetherbrainConfrontation_153.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_153.text: I respected Bhaal's child once, but not you, Gortash. I allowed you to control me as long as it suited my purpose.

NetherbrainConfrontation_127.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_127.text: The delusions are all yours, Gortash. You controlled me only for as long as I allowed you to.

NetherbrainConfrontation_96.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_96.text: The next order to be given is mine and it is this - die.

NetherbrainConfrontation_4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gortash mugs in his ultimate moment of confusion before his head is caught in a localized psionic burst and his body clatters to the ground like stringless puppet.

NetherbrainConfrontation_161.speaker: Minsc
NetherbrainConfrontation_161.text: Gah! Boo will be scrubbing scoundrel from his fur for a tenday.

NetherbrainConfrontation_62.speaker: Shadowheart
NetherbrainConfrontation_62.text: Hells. Talk about wiping the smirk off his face...

NetherbrainConfrontation_145.speaker: Astarion
NetherbrainConfrontation_145.text: Sweet hells! Well, that's what you get.

NetherbrainConfrontation_111.speaker: Gale
NetherbrainConfrontation_111.text: Hells. His mind crumpled like a piece of parchment.

NetherbrainConfrontation_26.speaker: Karlach
NetherbrainConfrontation_26.text: Hahaha! Oh wow. Yes. That's what you get, fucker.

NetherbrainConfrontation_163.speaker: Halsin
NetherbrainConfrontation_163.text: Oak Father preserve us. That scheming brain is but a feast for the worms now...

NetherbrainConfrontation_1.speaker: Jaheira
NetherbrainConfrontation_1.text: Huh. That great big brain of his got him in the end.
NetherbrainConfrontation_1.context: NodeContext: Deadpan - you've just seen the great scheming villain get his head exploded

NetherbrainConfrontation_14.context: CinematicNodeContext: The combined stones float up into frame from Gortash's body (we don't need to see it leave his body), settling in mid-air above the player's palm.

NetherbrainConfrontation_151.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player clasps the combined Netherstones close to their heart and they refocus their efforts.

NetherbrainConfrontation_22.speaker: Player
NetherbrainConfrontation_22.text: You are strong. You are mighty. You will dominate the brain.

NetherbrainConfrontation_56.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player  thrusts both hands forward, sending forth a new harpoon.

NetherbrainConfrontation_139.context: CinematicNodeContext: The third harpoon sinks deep into the Netherbrain's cranium, not far off from the target of the second.InternalNodeContext: Can't be aliased from previous phase, each harpoon is discrete

NetherbrainConfrontation_118.context: CinematicNodeContext: This spectral harpoon deflects off a psionic barrier created by the Netherbrain and drifts limply in front of the massive visage.InternalNodeContext: Can't be aliased from previous phase, each harpoon is discrete

NetherbrainConfrontation_46.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_46.text: When the parasite entered your ruined mind - you became a pawn in my design.
NetherbrainConfrontation_46.context: CinematicNodeContext: The brain focuses its beady eyes on the player.

NetherbrainConfrontation_101.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_101.text: Who do you think told the Chosen about the Astral Prism?

NetherbrainConfrontation_68.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_68.text: Who do you think planted the knowledge of Orpheus' power, and the fear of what it could do?

NetherbrainConfrontation_51.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_51.text: When the Chosen sent my thralls to retrieve the Prism - who do you think let the 'Emperor' slip its leash, knowing it would be the one to bring you to me?

NetherbrainConfrontation_88.speaker: The Emperor
NetherbrainConfrontation_88.text: We were part of its plan...
NetherbrainConfrontation_88.context: NodeContext: absolute shock and horror as it realises it wasn't even slightly special

NetherbrainConfrontation_11.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_11.text: I only needed one Netherstone loosened from the Chosen's grasp to guarantee my freedom.

NetherbrainConfrontation_25.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_25.text: You brought all three back to me. In doing so, you have liberated me.

NetherbrainConfrontation_119.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_119.text: This was your role - and it is complete.

NetherbrainConfrontation_93.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_93.text: Now you will witness the Grand Design.

NetherbrainConfrontation_12.speaker: Lae'zel
NetherbrainConfrontation_12.text: Again! The Grand Design must not come to pass!

NetherbrainConfrontation_105.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player, holding the composite Netherstone in both hands, slowly brings it to their forehead for the final phase of the spell.

NetherbrainConfrontation_147.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player closes their eyes to focus, holding the Netherstone to their head. Their eyes pop open as 3 new spectal harpoons spiral toward the brain. Sinking deeper into it's face.

NetherbrainConfrontation_83.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The brain shakes its promethean head, and all chains dissapate.

The player has failed.

NetherbrainConfrontation_134.context: CinematicNodeContext: The brain lets out a psionic boom that knocks the player and their party to the ground.

NetherbrainConfrontation_43.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The Astral Prism expands into a portal appears and the emperor levitates through.

Emperor faces down the brain.

NetherbrainConfrontation_106.speaker: The Emperor
NetherbrainConfrontation_106.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Emperor psionically flings the player through the portal into safety, then goes into the portal and closes it.

NetherbrainConfrontation_138.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Netherbrain speaks as the Astral Prism itself retreats through the Karsus' Portal

NetherbrainConfrontation_162.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The (faceless) brain blasts upwards through the ceiling.  
Cut to Upper City, the evolved Netherbrain is levitating above the High Hall. Nautiloids arrive, flanking the brain, and a pulse of psychic energy washes over the city.

NetherbrainConfrontation_157.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Real world: Ceremorphosis, baby!]

Cut to: Baldur's Gate streets. The infected begin to transform. Chaos, screaming, panic.

NetherbrainConfrontation_144.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Fade to black]

Camera pans back up to nautiloids arriving above city. Fade to black. Feels like we're about to get a game over scene.

NetherbrainConfrontation_120.speaker: Player
NetherbrainConfrontation_120.text: Give up. Allow the brain to dominate you.

NetherbrainConfrontation_52.speaker: Karlach
NetherbrainConfrontation_52.text: Whoa, whoa, soldier, what are you doing?!
NetherbrainConfrontation_52.context: NodeContext: Shock and panic, the player has just chosen to give up to the elder brain

NetherbrainConfrontation_3.speaker: Jaheira
NetherbrainConfrontation_3.text: What are you doing? Fight. Fight!
NetherbrainConfrontation_3.context: NodeContext: Incredulous, panicked - at the critical moment, the player is giving in and allowing the brain to dominate them. Game over, everyone dies.

NetherbrainConfrontation_100.speaker: The Emperor
NetherbrainConfrontation_100.text: You FOOL. You have ruined us all.

NetherbrainConfrontation_7.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
NetherbrainConfrontation_7.context: NodeContext: straj is drow for 'damn' as a horrified exclamation here.She is about to die - along with everyone else - because the player surrendered to the elder brain.

NetherbrainConfrontation_55.speaker: Lae'zel
NetherbrainConfrontation_55.text: No - stop! This isn't the way!

NetherbrainConfrontation_86.speaker: Gale
NetherbrainConfrontation_86.text: What in the hells are you doing?
NetherbrainConfrontation_86.context: NodeContext: Urgent/horrified - the player is surrendering to the enemy you're trying to fight!

NetherbrainConfrontation_95.speaker: Astarion
NetherbrainConfrontation_95.text: No - what are you doing? Fight, damn you!
NetherbrainConfrontation_95.context: NodeContext: watching shocked as the player gives up and lets the brain control them

NetherbrainConfrontation_114.speaker: Minsc
NetherbrainConfrontation_114.text: My friend...? MY FRIEND! Now is no time for the napping!

NetherbrainConfrontation_70.speaker: Shadowheart
NetherbrainConfrontation_70.text: We need to put a stop to this - now!

NetherbrainConfrontation_112.speaker: Astarion
NetherbrainConfrontation_112.text: We have to stop it - it's now or never!

NetherbrainConfrontation_104.speaker: Wyll
NetherbrainConfrontation_104.text: No! We have to stop this!

NetherbrainConfrontation_82.speaker: Gale
NetherbrainConfrontation_82.text: We can't afford to let that happen.

NetherbrainConfrontation_39.speaker: Karlach
NetherbrainConfrontation_39.text: Shit - no! It's all been leading to this - we stop the brain. Now!

NetherbrainConfrontation_152.speaker: Halsin
NetherbrainConfrontation_152.text: No, we cannot give up - not after all we have been through.

NetherbrainConfrontation_132.speaker: Jaheira
NetherbrainConfrontation_132.text: We are not done yet. Try again!
NetherbrainConfrontation_132.context: NodeContext: Resolute - we've been bruised but not beaten, we can't give up yet

NetherbrainConfrontation_35.speaker: Minsc
NetherbrainConfrontation_35.text: NO! Minsc of Rashemen has never bowed to a brain, and we will not begin today. AGAIN!

NetherbrainConfrontation_21.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
NetherbrainConfrontation_21.text: No - the abomination shall witness our vengeance! Refocus your efforts!
NetherbrainConfrontation_21.context: NodeContext: with fury and desperation - the final battle against the netherbrain is raging, and Minthara responds to the brain declaring that the party will 'witness the grand design'.

NetherbrainConfrontation_159.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_159.text: And you - you had your role to play, too.
NetherbrainConfrontation_159.context: CinematicNodeContext: The brain focuses its beady eyes on the player. NodeContext: Brain addresses the player

NetherbrainConfrontation_20.speaker: Player
NetherbrainConfrontation_20.text: Your resilience will not be shaken - cast the spell again.

NetherbrainConfrontation_128.speaker: Player
NetherbrainConfrontation_128.text: It may not be easy, but it was always supposed to be possible - do it again.

NetherbrainConfrontation_31.speaker: Player
NetherbrainConfrontation_31.text: Bow before the glory of the Netherbrain. Submit to domination.

NetherbrainConfrontation_6.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
NetherbrainConfrontation_6.text: Straj. We can not suffer the same fate...
NetherbrainConfrontation_6.context: NodeContext: /stræd͡ʒ/ - drow language 'damn', delivered as a startled curse. The final battle against the netherbrain is about to begin, and an ally just had their head telepathically detonated by the brain. Minthara is shocked and scared.

NetherbrainConfrontation_103.speaker: The Emperor
NetherbrainConfrontation_103.text: Resist! You cannot let it do the same to you!

NetherbrainConfrontation_58.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_58.text: You brought the Crown to me, Bhaalspawn, thinking the army I amassed with it would become yours.

NetherbrainConfrontation_24.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_24.text: Your plan was devious, your cruelty unparalleled. I would have followed it, were your mind not destroyed by your sister.

NetherbrainConfrontation_116.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_116.text: But with you gone, the three pitiful Chosen fought like children in your wake. I gave them power to harm one another with, while I crafted my design.

NetherbrainConfrontation_89.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_89.text: I used the Chosen, while they thought they used me. But the orders are now mine to give.

NetherbrainConfrontation_27.speaker: The Emperor
NetherbrainConfrontation_27.text: I won't allow it. Again! Dominate it!

NetherbrainConfrontation_10.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_10.text: I needed the Crown to build an army. I needed the Chosen to bring it to me.

NetherbrainConfrontation_97.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_97.text: They would not have surrendered it freely, so I gave them what they wanted - power.

NetherbrainConfrontation_98.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_98.text: Just enough that they would play their part in my design.

NetherbrainConfrontation_146.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_146.text: Their part has ended. The next orders will be mine.

NetherbrainConfrontation_71.speaker: Player
NetherbrainConfrontation_71.text: A first attempt is just that - iteration is key. Aim for the Crown and try again.

NetherbrainConfrontation_149.speaker: Player
NetherbrainConfrontation_149.text: Nothing is immune to influence - determine to master the brain.

NetherbrainConfrontation_143.speaker: The Netherbrain
NetherbrainConfrontation_143.text: By eliminating Ketheric, Orin, and Gortash, you have simply unbound me.

NetherbrainConfrontation_115.speaker: Player
NetherbrainConfrontation_115.text: Your mind is yours to command - block out all possibility of failure and compel the brain to submit.

NetherbrainConfrontation_158.speaker: Player
NetherbrainConfrontation_158.text: You have survived this far - trust yourself. Dominate the brain.

NetherbrainConfrontation_142.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player is completely wiped off their feet - the stones scatter almost out of reach. Player pulls them back at last minute and scrabbles to their feet.

NetherbrainConfrontation_135.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
NetherbrainConfrontation_135.text: Rise. I, Lord Enver Gortash, Chosen of Bane, command you.
NetherbrainConfrontation_135.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gortash raises his Netherstone into the air to command the brain, like he's done a million times before.

NetherbrainConfrontation_160.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Gortash's stone drifts out of his hand.

He reacts with surprise as floats in front of the player, joing its counterpart Netherstones collected from the defeated Chosen.

The three stones combine in mid-air, and land in the player's hand.

PAD_MissingStone_0.speaker: Player
PAD_MissingStone_0.text: We need all three stones before we can face the brain.

PAD_MissingStone_1.speaker: Player
PAD_MissingStone_1.text: It better be around here somewhere.

NetherIllusionAstarion_5.speaker: 24ee9c4a-f9ab-4878-8848-27f50822ef2c
NetherIllusionAstarion_5.text: |Just leave me alone, please, I beg you. No more!.|

NetherIllusionAstarion_13.speaker: Lae'zel
NetherIllusionAstarion_13.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionAstarion_10.speaker: Jaheira
NetherIllusionAstarion_10.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionAstarion_0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
NetherIllusionAstarion_0.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionAstarion_6.speaker: 24ee9c4a-f9ab-4878-8848-27f50822ef2c
NetherIllusionAstarion_6.text: |Why will no one let me be! I can't, no more!.|

NetherIllusionAstarion_12.speaker: Elder Brain
NetherIllusionAstarion_12.text:
|Always vulnrable...
..always bent to the will of others...
Pathetic|

NetherIllusionAstarion_17.speaker: Karlach
NetherIllusionAstarion_17.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionAstarion_9.speaker: Wyll
NetherIllusionAstarion_9.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionAstarion_8.speaker: Shadowheart
NetherIllusionAstarion_8.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionAstarion_7.speaker: Gale
NetherIllusionAstarion_7.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionAstarion_16.speaker: Astarion
NetherIllusionAstarion_16.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionAstarion_3.speaker: Minsc
NetherIllusionAstarion_3.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionAstarion_4.speaker: Halsin
NetherIllusionAstarion_4.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

Arrival_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: As the boast drifts towards the shore, a sudden brainquake.

Arrival_4.context:
CinematicNodeContext: A stalactite is shaken loose by the brainquake and drops on the boat, smashing and sinking it. 
The party scrabbles to shore.

Arrival_3.speaker: Narrator
Arrival_3.text: *An overwhelming force pushes into your mind. The brain. It is here.*
Arrival_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: party react with fear - there is a presence all around themNodeContext: tension - the brain is the most dangerous threat the party have ever faced, and it's close

Arrival_1.speaker: Elder Brain
Arrival_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player turning to find source as each utterance comes from another angle. Flashes of the brain, shadowy, silhouetted.

Arrival_2.speaker: Elder Brain
Arrival_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: One last lingering flash of the brain. NodeContext: [ChristianD] We would like to have the Netherbrain's voice to be stronger here than the previous node. And as the Netherbrain says "extinguish" we would like more emphasis on this word because we're planning a 'jump scare' moment to be aligned with the word.

AD_EmperorPortalEscape_0.speaker: The Emperor
AD_EmperorPortalEscape_0.text: |You cannot win this. Escape through the portal, NOW!|

PAD_DeadSmugglerResolve_0.speaker: Player
PAD_DeadSmugglerResolve_0.text: Separated in life, united in death. Let's hope they can find peace now.

PAD_DeadSmugglerResolve_1.speaker: Player
PAD_DeadSmugglerResolve_1.text: They didn't deserve this - no one does. Yet another reason to kill the brain.

NetherIllusionGale_14.speaker: 2632a733-44a8-41d6-8740-99fad6c96024
NetherIllusionGale_14.text: |At the precipice of the end. We have front row seats at least.|

NetherIllusionGale_5.speaker: Lae'zel
NetherIllusionGale_5.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionGale_11.speaker: Jaheira
NetherIllusionGale_11.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionGale_8.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
NetherIllusionGale_8.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionGale_16.speaker: Karlach
NetherIllusionGale_16.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionGale_1.speaker: Wyll
NetherIllusionGale_1.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionGale_7.speaker: Shadowheart
NetherIllusionGale_7.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionGale_3.speaker: Gale
NetherIllusionGale_3.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionGale_4.speaker: Astarion
NetherIllusionGale_4.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionGale_13.speaker: Minsc
NetherIllusionGale_13.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionGale_17.speaker: Halsin
NetherIllusionGale_17.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

PAD_PsionicallySupressed_0.speaker: Player
PAD_PsionicallySupressed_0.text: My mind... it's being drained. Must be close...
PAD_PsionicallySupressed_0.context: NodeContext: Effort/strain - party can feel the Netherbrain's influence as they draw near it

PAD_BrainquakeStunned_3.speaker: Player
PAD_BrainquakeStunned_3.text: Hells that was strong. Thought my skull was going to crack.

PAD_BrainquakeStunned_4.speaker: Player
PAD_BrainquakeStunned_4.text: Probably not the last time that'll happen.

PAD_BrainquakeStunned_2.speaker: Player
PAD_BrainquakeStunned_2.text: Must be close if it's hitting that hard.

NetherIllusionWyll_17.speaker: Narrator
NetherIllusionWyll_17.text: |Piles of dead Tiefling children lay round this phantom Wyll's feet. His face is draped in misery.|

NetherIllusionWyll_13.speaker: 1b9549ba-3a34-4512-a429-71fd774901a4
NetherIllusionWyll_13.text: |I was supposed to be a hero. Blade of Frontiers, what a farce.|

NetherIllusionWyll_11.speaker: Lae'zel
NetherIllusionWyll_11.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionWyll_2.speaker: Jaheira
NetherIllusionWyll_2.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionWyll_1.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
NetherIllusionWyll_1.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionWyll_15.speaker: Karlach
NetherIllusionWyll_15.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionWyll_6.speaker: Wyll
NetherIllusionWyll_6.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionWyll_0.speaker: Shadowheart
NetherIllusionWyll_0.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionWyll_16.speaker: 1b9549ba-3a34-4512-a429-71fd774901a4
NetherIllusionWyll_16.text: |I should be damned to the hells. No more of this.|

NetherIllusionWyll_14.speaker: Gale
NetherIllusionWyll_14.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionWyll_4.speaker: Astarion
NetherIllusionWyll_4.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionWyll_9.speaker: Minsc
NetherIllusionWyll_9.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionWyll_3.speaker: Halsin
NetherIllusionWyll_3.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionShadowheart_11.speaker: Narrator
NetherIllusionShadowheart_11.text: |A figure that looks a lot like Shadowheart is knelt over and sofly crying, holding something close to her chest.|

NetherIllusionShadowheart_10.speaker: Lae'zel
NetherIllusionShadowheart_10.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionShadowheart_3.speaker: Jaheira
NetherIllusionShadowheart_3.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionShadowheart_7.speaker: Narrator
NetherIllusionShadowheart_7.text: |She turns her attention towards you, now in clear view of the object in her hand. The head of her father lost in a vacant gaze.|

NetherIllusionShadowheart_0.speaker: c2292593-06c7-4db4-868f-21797c87573f
NetherIllusionShadowheart_0.text: |She returns to looking at the head, gently brushing her fingers upon its cheek.|

NetherIllusionShadowheart_4.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
NetherIllusionShadowheart_4.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionShadowheart_9.speaker: Karlach
NetherIllusionShadowheart_9.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionShadowheart_12.speaker: Wyll
NetherIllusionShadowheart_12.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionShadowheart_15.speaker: Shadowheart
NetherIllusionShadowheart_15.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionShadowheart_16.speaker: Gale
NetherIllusionShadowheart_16.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionShadowheart_17.speaker: Astarion
NetherIllusionShadowheart_17.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionShadowheart_18.speaker: Minsc
NetherIllusionShadowheart_18.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|

NetherIllusionShadowheart_19.speaker: Halsin
NetherIllusionShadowheart_19.text: |The Netherbrain is trying to get to us. Hold yourself together!|
